name: Buc Mobile, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to offer programming interfaces and software development kits. The company's application offers interfaces for messaging, carrier intelligence, device and operating systems applications, as well as offer mobile cloud and carrier infrastructure management services to movie and media studios, enabling content providers and Internet companies to offer efficient and productive content for publishing.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed to offer programming interfaces and software development kits. The company's application offers interfaces for messaging, carrier intelligence, device and operating systems applications, as well as offer mobile cloud and carrier infrastructure management services to movie and media studios, enabling content providers and Internet companies to offer efficient and productive content for publishing.
